docs.snippet: The country needs a legitimate police force where officers deal with civilians not as their enemies but as fellow citizens....
docs.lead_paragraph: The country needs a legitimate police force where officers deal with civilians not as their enemies but as fellow citizens.
docs.abstract: Op-Ed article by novelist and columnist Vanessa Barbara laments military police system in Brazil that provokes both police brutality and poor working conditions for police; supports proposals to demilitarize police; holds that demilitarizing force would grant more labor rights to officers, releasing them from military code of conduct, and confer to civilian justice system authority to judge all crimes committed by officers.

docs.lead_paragraph: The MacArthur Foundation has chosen seven nonprofits for grants of as much as $1 million to recognize their success and future potential in work ranging from promoting the rights of Nigerian women to researching anti-crime programs in Chicago, the foundation announced Thursday.

docs.lead_paragraph: Months after lanes leading to the George Washington Bridge were closed, the chairman of the Port Authority of New York and New Jersey offered an apology to commuters.
docs.abstract: Port Authority chairman David Samson holds public hearing to offer apology to commuters months after lanes leading to George Washington Bridge were closed for political retribution; Samson's own role has been questioned in recent weeks.

docs.snippet: The Venezuelan military planned to send additional troops to a border region where unrest has been particularly fierce, officials said Thursday, as the government faced growing criticism for its heavy-handed attempt to subdue a protest movement wi...
docs.lead_paragraph: The Venezuelan military planned to send additional troops to a border region where unrest has been particularly fierce, officials said Thursday, as the government faced growing criticism for its heavy-handed attempt to subdue a protest movement with nighttime sweeps that have turned many parts of the country into dangerous free-fire zones.

docs.snippet: Security forces and protesters fought around Venezuela on Thursday in streets blocked by burning barricades and a supporter of socialist President Nicolas Maduro was shot dead, the sixth fatality from more than a week of violence....
